page.title: 08FARMING
page.content:
Sandown and Shanklin on the coast are heavily populated and built up. Inland ,to the east,the land is much more open and includes some scrub and woodland.
Most of the fields around our area are used as pasture land for cattle belonging to near by farms.Not much of the land is used for crops because of the chalky soil. Here are the names of some of the farms in our area:Yard Farm,Hill Farm, Apse Manor Farm,Peartree Farm,Branston Farm Cheverton Farm,Merry Gardens Farm and Princelett Farm.There are a number of market gardens also in the area which sell vegetables and fruit etc. We also have a poultry farm which owns no less than 16,000 hens.
